EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Reminder - Paris
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Paris. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow—Paris Thursday, 7th July 2016 9:00am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/paris]]>
Location: COM’SQUARE <[[http://www.groupenci.com/fr/centres/nci-comsquare-la-defense]]> 57 Esplanade du Général de Gaulle 92081 Paris La Défense cedex
Questions? Contact Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
